English: Sends the flag for the next train mob's nearest Aetheryte into chat
Sends the flag for the next train mob into chat
Simplified Chinese: 发送狩猎车下一站坐标至聊天

English: Counter window -- for counter-based S ranks
Simplified Chinese: 计数器窗口 -- 面相农怪触发的S

English: If you've found this plugin useful and want to show some support.

Use a map image instead of blank background - Map Images Created By Cable Monkey of Goblin - http://cablemonkey.us/huntmap2/ -  Same thing for spawn point data :D - If map images aren't showing, please verify that you have the images downloaded in your plugins folder.
Simplified Chinese: 使用地图图片替代空白背景 - 地图图片由 Cable Monkey of Goblin创建

English: Allows Hunt Helper to scan while GUI inactive. Enables notifications, recording Train, etc. while this main map window is inactive.
Simplified Chinese: 允许GUI在未开启时扫描。在地图窗口未开启时启用通知，狩猎车录制等等。

English: Show the loaded hunt and spawn point data
Simplified Chinese: 显示已加载的狩猎和刷新点数据

English: Shows Zone Name\nAdjust position below as % of window.
Simplified Chinese: 显示区域名\n调整位置位于窗口之下的%

English: Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Drag to speed up.
Simplified Chinese: Ctrl+单击手动输入，Shift+拖拽加速

English: Alternate colour for when map image is used.
Simplified Chinese: 当启用地图图片时的替换颜色

English: Shows World Name\nAdjust position below as % of window
Simplified Chinese: 显示服务器名\n调整位置位于窗口之下的%

English: Window Colour - Opacity can be changed down below.
Simplified Chinese: 窗口颜色-下方可更改不透明度

English: Save a preset for quick switching - Size, opacity, position, and use map. Apply with command: /hh1 - Save with /hh1save or -->
Simplified Chinese: 保存用于快速切换的预设-窗口大小，不透明度，位置和是否使用地图。使用指令来应用：/hh1 - /hh1save来保存，或-->
玩家图标半径修改，默认1
狩猎怪图标半径修改，默认2
刷新点图标半径修改，默认1

English: Increase all icons proportionally, default: 1 - By Default, A Mob icon is 1.5x a Spawn Point, a Player icon is 0.2x a Spawn Point
Simplified Chinese: 按比例放大所有图标，默认1 - 默认下狩猎怪是1.5倍刷新点，玩家是0.2倍刷新点

English: Default represents 2 in-game coordinates. Modify if you feel this is inaccurate, default: 1
Simplified Chinese: 默认重放2个游戏内坐标，如果认为不准确就修改，默认1

English: Background of the player / detection circle.\nChange the Alpha A: for opacity
Simplified Chinese: 玩家/探测圈背景。\n修改Alpha A来设置透明度

English: Message to send to chat using /echo, usable tags: <flag> <name> <rank> <hpp>
Simplified Chinese: 使用/echo发送到聊天的信息，可用标签<flag> <name> <rank> <hpp>

English: Message to use with Text-to-Speech, usable tags: <name> <rank>
Simplified Chinese: 发送使用文字转语音的信息，可用标签<name><rank>

English: FlyText is the type of text that appears when you attack something or are attacked. (e.g. Crit, Miss, Resist)\n\nEnabling this will show a coloured FlyText notification near the middle of your screen.
Simplified Chinese: 弹出文本是当你攻击或被攻击时出现的文字。（例如：暴击，失误，复活）\n\n启用此选项将在屏幕中央显示多彩的弹出文本通知

English: Draws a 'quest pointer' type thingy, it's a bit glitchy but works well enough. Change size in settings
Simplified Chinese: 绘制一个类似“任务指针”的东西，有点小问题但是够用。设置里修改尺寸。

English: Size modifier for the diamond pointer
DOUBLE CLICK to easily highlight a tag option for copy and paste.  -- ONLY <name> and <rank> work with TTS
Simplified Chinese: 双击来高亮标签便于复制和粘贴。 --在TTS中只有 <name> 和 <rank> 有效

English: The big thing that labels highest rank mob in zone, S/SS > A > B - Ctrl+Click to enter manually, Shift+Click for fast drag.
Simplified Chinese: 区域内的狩猎怪优先级标签， S/SS > A > B - Ctrl+单击手动输入，Shift+单击快速拖拽

English: Main = without map, Alt = with map images, - Turn up Alpha A: for solid colour.
Simplified Chinese: 主要=无地图，替换=有地图图片， - 提高Alpha A来改透明度

English: A list of all nearby mobs.
There's nothing here\nOptions are available from the main map window,
Simplified Chinese: 啥也没有\n设置在在主地图窗口

English: Attempting to download, please wait.\n\nIf there seems to be a problem, please manually download from
Simplified Chinese: 尝试下载，请稍等\n\n如果有问题，请从以下链接手动下载

English: Please download the images manually, or try deleting the Images/Map folder + RESET PLUGIN, and attempt download again
Simplified Chinese: 请手动下载图片，或尝试删除Images/Map文件夹并重置插件，并尝试再次下载

English: Okay, Don't Show Me This Again. Thanks.
Could not find map images This is expected if this is your first time.\nWould you like to try to download them? (~23.2MB)
Simplified Chinese: 找不到地图图片，可能这是你初次使用。\n要下载吗？(~23.2MB)

English: Or you can view and manually download from
Simplified Chinese: 或者你可以从这里查看或者手动下载

English: Copy export code clipboard.\nWarning: The code will be too long to be pasted into in-game chat. Share via Discord.
Simplified Chinese: 复制输出代码剪贴板。\n警告：该代码很长，无法粘贴到游戏中的聊天记录。通过 Discord 分享。

English: Teleport will initiate even if you are closer to the mob / on the same map. pls adjust thx
Simplified Chinese: 即使你和狩猎怪附近或同一张图也会传送，请调整。

English: HOW TO: Background | Click on any of the rows to send the relevant Map Link into chat. (Drag to reorder the list)   || Click on the checkbox to mark a mob as dead. ||Use the command /hhn to automatically mark the current selected as dead
Japanese: and set the next mob flag
German: and automatically teleport if enabled. |(you will have to click the first one manually) ||Use the command /hhna to set the flag as the closest Aetheryte (Not the mob) and automatically teleport if enabled. This will override and disable the /hhn teleport. |You can then use /hhn to get the flag for the next mob without initiating a teleport. ||Use the Export and Import buttons to share and compile scouts with others. ||Only records A ranks."
column9: 如何使用：背景 - 点任何一行来发送相关地图链接到聊天。（拖拽来录制列表）。点击确认框来标记已死亡的狩猎怪。使用指令\/hhn来自动标记死亡当前选择的怪物，并发送下一个地图链接到聊天。（第一次不得不手动点）*不允许重复（当前不处理多线或多服务器）-只记录A怪*

English: Show how long since the hunt was found.
Simplified Chinese: 显示距离上次发现过了多久

English: Open the relevant map when /hhn used or when name clicked.
Simplified Chinese: 当/hhn启用或单击名称时开启相关地图

English: Show teleport buttons. Probably best to use this instead of tele on click.
Simplified Chinese: 显示传送按键，可能相比点击传送更好

English: Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when hunt is clicked. This will begin tele even if you try to reorder or click just for chat link.
Simplified Chinese: 当点击狩猎时，启动传送到最近的以太水晶。这将开始传送，即使你试图重新排序或点击只是为了聊天链接。

English: Initiate teleport to closest Aetheryte when /hhn used.
Simplified Chinese: 当使用/hhn时，启动传送到最近的以太水晶。

English: Open the train UI when importing from another plugin
Teleporting requires the Teleporter Plugin by Pohky. Please install it via /xlplugins or uncheck teleport options.
Simplified Chinese: 传送功能依赖Pohky的Teleporter插件。请通过/xlplugins安装或者取消传送选项。

English: Are you sure you want to DELETE train data?
Simplified Chinese: 你确定你要*删除*狩猎车序？

English: Nothing to import - or incorrect code. The export code is too long to be shared via in-game chat. Please share through Discord or something.
Simplified Chinese: 没有可导入，或者错误的代码。导入代码很长，无法粘贴到游戏中的聊天记录。通过 Discord 或其他分享。

English: Overwrites current data with imported data
Imports new mobs and updates old mobs Last Seen times, if applicable
Simplified Chinese: 导入新怪并上传上次发现的时间，如果可用的话。

English: Export all currently recorded map data
Simplified Chinese: 导出所有现在已记录的地图数据

English: Used for recording taken spawn positions. Helpful for position-specific spawns such as Nandi, Gamma, Tarchia, Burfulululu, Narrow-Rift, etc. Data persists and is saved to file, Turning recording off will reset tracked data.
Simplified Chinese: 用于记录排点。 有助于特定点位的触发，例如 南迪、伽马、多智兽、布弗鲁、狭缝 等。数据持续存在并保存到文件中，关闭记录将重置跟踪数据。

English: Stop Recording -- This will WIPE all data.
Simplified Chinese: 停止录制 -- 这将清空所有数据

English: Stop Recording All -- This will WIPE all data.
Simplified Chinese: 停止录制所有 -- 这将清空所有数据

English: Nothing to import - or incorrect code
Simplified Chinese: 无数据导入 - 或代码错误

English: Import and Overwrite current data for these maps
Simplified Chinese: 导入并覆盖这些地图的现有数据
允许在窗口关闭的时候计数
